title: Geography and General Knowledge Quiz
instructions:
Please answer all questions.

Multiple-choice questions require selecting only one option.
Fill-in-the-blank answers must be typed exactly or very close to the correct answer.

Your answers are autosaved. You may submit multiple times.

questions.text: Which continent is the largest by land area?
questions.explanation: Asia is the largest continent, covering approximately 44.5 million square kilometers.

questions.text: What is the capital city of Japan?
questions.explanation: Tokyo has been the official capital of Japan since 1869.

questions.text: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.explanation: Mars is commonly referred to as the Red Planet due to its reddish appearance caused by iron oxide.

questions.text: Fill in the blank: The chemical symbol for water is ____.
questions.explanation: Water is composed of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.

questions.text: Which ocean is the deepest in the world?
questions.explanation: The Pacific Ocean contains the Mariana Trench, the deepest known point on Earth.
